text: ye (kambakht) jhoothee baaton ko bade shauq se sunane vaale aur bade hee haraamakhor hain to (ai rasool) agar ye log tumhaare paas (koee maamala lekar) aae to tumako ikhteyaar hai khvaah unake daramiyaan phaisala kar do ya unase kinaaraakashee karo aur agar tum kinaaraakash rahoge to (kuchh khyaal na karo) ye log tumhaara haragiz kuchh bigaad nahin sakate aur agar unamen phaisala karo to insaaf se phaisala karo kyonki khuda insaaf karane vaalon ko dost rakhata hai
